meanings.definition: The quality or state of being wise.
meanings.sent1: Her wiseness shone through when she gave valuable advice to her friends.
meanings.sent2: His wiseness in decision-making helped him succeed in his career.
meanings.sent3: The owl's wiseness was evident as it guided the lost travelers back to the right path.
meanings.sent4: Grandma's wiseness was like a beacon of light in our family, guiding us through tough times.
meanings.sent5: The wizened old man shared his wiseness with the young ones, teaching them valuable life lessons.

meanings.definition: The ability to make good judgments based on knowledge and experience.
meanings.sent1: The professor's wiseness in the subject made his lectures engaging and informative.
meanings.sent2: She relied on her wiseness to navigate through difficult situations at work.
meanings.sent3: The cat's wiseness in catching mice made it the hero of the barn.
meanings.sent4: The wizened tree's wiseness in weathering storms symbolized resilience and strength.
meanings.sent5: The wizened wizard's wiseness was unmatched, making him the most sought-after advisor in the kingdom.
